title: BFSI sector betting big on tech spends; experts assess impact on Indian IT cos - CNBCTV18
content: BFSI sector betting big on tech spends; experts assess impact on Indian IT cos  CNBCTV18
description: Thereâ€™s been a rise in the banking, financial services and insurance (BFSI) sector spends. To discuss this and its benefits, CNBC-TV18 spoke to Sandip Agarwal, Research Analyst, Institutional Equities, Edelweiss Securities, and Amit Chandra, Research Analyst- IT, HDFC Securities.
